entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates non-compilable code with new property changing enum types #101273
  • Misleading error message when referenced assembly is built for different CPU architecture than project #101271
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates non-compilable code with new property and internal setter #101267
  • Reevaluate `params ReadOnlySpan<string>` overloads from #77873 #101261
    9.0.0
  • [cdac-build-tool] Take baseline as a command line argument #101257
  • [wasi] Enable debugger support using wasi preview/2 apis #101253
    9.0.0
  • Switching to Vectors from target dependent instrinsics #101251
  • [API Proposal]: Expose flattened index get/set on Array #101244
  • [API Proposal]: Add ZipArchiveEntry.Open overload #101243
  • GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute can cause error CS0111: Type 'InterfaceImplementation' already defines a member called 'ABI_Blah' with the same parameter types #101242
  • GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute can cause CS0108 error with two derived COM interfaces declaring methods with same name and signature #101240
  • Problem writing a large file to ZipArchive #101238
  • [browser] Watch doesn't rebuild the application #101237
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Efficiently copy a string with a set of chars removed (and/or kept) #101235
  • QuicConnection.OpenOutboundStreamAsync can hang indefinitely #101233
    9.0.0
  • .NET 6 Application fails after windows updates with Hostpolicy.dll missing #101231
  • GetTypes on a collectibe assembly fails under special circumstances #101230
  • Go over trimming tests we disabled for AOT #101228
    9.0.0
  • [BUG] Version downgrade in .NET 8 for vcruntime140_cor3.dll leads to broken Microsoft Installers #101225
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 4/16/2024 8:34:24 PM #101247
  • Regex.Match is different between .NET 8.0.4 and .NET Framework 4.8 #101223
  • [mono] Interpreter generates bad code for Scalar<T>.Equals #101222

Closed

  • Test failure: Interop\StringMarshalling\VBByRefStr\VBByRefStrTest\VBByRefStrTest.cmd #100363
  • Non-generic instance: the extern static method itself doesn't have a type parameter #101266
  • [API Proposal]: Chunk method #101194
  • Codegen generates code referencing RuntimeType for `__Canon[]` #101175
  • Floating-point to integer conversions should saturate on overflow #101254
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete invalid overloads of `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate` family #95525
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Add missing new-style ABI classifiers for LA64 and RISCV64 #100744
    9.0.0
  • In certain cases on MacOS, LINQ and IEnumerator::MoveNext() causes stack overflow #100663
  • Task.WaitAll missing IEnumerable<Task> overload #34106
    9.0.0
  • [Ping] Consider adding a way to specify a "Source" address while sending a ping. #29248
  • RE: System.NullReferenceException when using System.Speech 7.0.0-rc.1.22426.10 from Windows Forms #94435
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Work around an issue hit after VS upgrades #79537
    9.0.0
  • Follow up with removing INLINE_GETTHREAD_CONSTANT_POOL pattern, in the context of coreclr #85732
    Future
  • Deserialization error for default datetime with offset other than 0 #101066

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #101272
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Stop building AppHost in native AOT testing #101270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable control flow guard for AOT compilers #101269
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ignore ControlFlowGuard outside Windows #101268
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Enable tests for extern static methods without type parameters #101265
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Http CI test #101264
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Miscellaneous startup optimizations #101263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • SHAKE Read, Reset, and Clone #101262
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #101260
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • Vector128<T> wrong throw helper call #101258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Extend the copy propagation type check to local field cases #101256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ASP.NET User-Unhandled Exceptions #101255
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable jiterp #101252
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] faster memory view refresh + cleanup #101249
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] stop doing grow(0) #101248
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride validation error #101246
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "disable optimizations for PopCount (#99796)" #101245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pass GitHubRepositoryName as a build argument. #101241
    source-build
  • Fix some comment typos #101232
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Run trimming tests as AOT tests #101229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Prune code from Monitor.Enter/Exit in single-threaded wasm builds of corlib #101221
    arch-wasm, area-CoreLib-mono
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • JIT: fix stress issue with profile consistency #101259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for dataflow with invalid annotations #101214
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix NullReferenceException in FileSystemWatcher on Windows during dispose #100766
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Introduce a `BuildAllTestsAsStandalone` environment variable to support some local dev scenarios. #100709
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add `alpine` to target triplet for crossbuild #101213
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disallow frozen `RuntimeType` for canonical types #101173
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete invalid AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate* overloads #99985
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, 9.0.0
  • [browser] enable 95791 #101236
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update queues. #101198
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0][mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #100810
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [browser] rename normal scenario to `WasmTestOnV8` #101226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Disable ChangeLocalTimeZone on MT #101227
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label, os-browser
  • [LoongArch64] add new ABI classifier. #101224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add Task.WaitAll overload for `IEnumerable<Task>` #100569
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0
  • [browser] rename WasmTestOnChrome #101140
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Optimize jiterpreter option table updates #101207
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Merge #91634 into release/8.0 #100994
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Reuse more templates in our build #101197
    area-Infrastructure
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Optimize out references to a bunch of BCL methods during JS interop startup #101217
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Run DependencyInjection trimming tests as native AOT. #101129
    linkable-framework, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix generic runtime lookup expansion in Tier0 #101153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix missing explicit frame pop on arm32 #101147
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger formatting #100181
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize Guid's GreaterThan operator to use 64bit compare. #100158
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Take into account the provided format in Utf8Parser.TryParse for bool #100676
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add some TODO #5213 comments #100954
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.122, windows: 123.0.6312.122 #101017
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Preserve static type info for return value of ctor #101212
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101144
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101167
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Add AppContext switch for OCSP Stapling #100917
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    Servicing-approved, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Insert a breakpoint instruction after throwing calls #101037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Changed GetNetworkInterfaces method to to retrieve information related to all interfaces #100824
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    area-Build-mono
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable string interop by value #2550
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • Update parser and emitter to support nested Swift types #2548
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge apr 24 #2543
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing error for missing workload set requested in global.json #40297
  • Notification of newer workload versions available isn't displayed with versions installed through Visual Studio #40295
    8.0.3xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack #40293
  • GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined error in dotnet SDK when installed via snap #40272

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Stabilize branding for the SDK 8.0.300 #40290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Manual backport of #37832 servicing fix #38047
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2433578 #40289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add APICompat support for checking generic constraints #40230
    Area-ApiCompat
  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • delete nonexistent feeds #40067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable a bunch of container tests #40191
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Plan for "Partial Properties" feature #73090
  • Test CollectionBuilder_MissingInt32 hits an assertion failure when lowering layer does not use int32 #73085
  • Floating-point to integer conversions should saturate on overflow #73084
  • Issue with Strong Name Signing stopping IntelliSense from working #73082

Closed

  • The caracteristic "Missing Importations detection" is not available due to an internal error. #73083
  • Compiler conversion crash with collectoin exprs. #72898
    17.11
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34817.155 #73076

PullRequests

Created

  • Defer loading source-texts on the OOP side until actually needed. (part2) #73094
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change IReferenceFinder.DetermineDocumentsToSearchAsync to not return an ImmutableArray #73093
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include file name in Contract failures #73092
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add partial properties feature status #73091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Hook up TS pull diagnostics with TODOs #73089
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Defer loading source-texts on the OOP side until actually needed. #73088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude assemblies shared by .NET ServiceHub host #73087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Visit binary operators in ref safety analysis #73081
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Watch razor and cshtml files for devkit #73077
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow WatchHotReloadService to change capabilities during session #73066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to an iterative approach to determining next sibling in the blender #73054
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pass along cancellation token in snippets #73071
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue in editor config filepath comparison #73033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • remove unused event from interface that was never subscribed to #73080
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Have the workspace cache the semantic model (after it is acquired) for the active document (if one exists). #73074
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to an explicit stack to avoid stack overflow when computing tree equivalence #73056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Document deviation from member lookup standard #72858
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Use 'nullable disabled' semantic model when computing FAR results #73078
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use 'nullable disabled' semantic model when computing doc highlights results #73079
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Nullable analysis of conditional operator should use best common type unless target typed #73047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • DO NOT MERGE. Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Followup work to handle ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject removal. #73049
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Select the protocol to be used by Signalr #55210
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55207
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55206
  • Perf regression: https #55205
  • API Proposal: AllowInteractiveRoutingAttribute for Blazor #55204
  • npm ERR! request to https://registry.npmjs.org/@microsoft%2fsignalr failed, reason: unable to verify the first certificate #55203
  • Minimal API : Converting empty string to Nullable (ex: int?) with [FromForm] binding #55202
  • Support for unique phone numbers, find user by phone number in Identity #55199
  • Overridden TryParseValueFromString does not appear to be used #55197
  • [QUIC] `QuicConnectionContext.Abort` calls connection shutdown with error code -1 #55196
  • Blazor Server - Deploy to IIS doesn't load wwwroot StaticFiles (404 not found) #55195
  • Meaningless error when using both Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect 8.0.4 and System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt 7.5.0 or higher #55194
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55192
  • Use hot reload with ws only #55190

Closed

  • [Static web assets] Define static web asset endpoints in the SDK and generate an endpoints manifest #54873
    9.0-preview4
  • Add built-in support for Swagger UI #55191
  • Add APIs for viewing generated OpenAPI file at runtime #54600
    9.0-preview4
  • init setter to have the same visibility as the most visible constructor, rather than the containing type #54059
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55176
  • Perf improvement: single_query #55156
  • Perf regression: single_query #55186
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55193
  • AuthorizeView tag with Roles attribute not working, always showing NotAuthorized content #54301
  • Allow override of base href during Blazor web assembly startup #55189
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, plaintext #55167
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55185
  • Intermediate MTLS certificates ignored by certificate authentication #53858
  • Blazor: NavigationManager.NavigateTo external URL sometimes throws ObjectDisposedException on HttpResponseStreamWriter #54997

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't output secret value from user-secrets set #55209
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Change how the key ring cache is updated #54675
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix exit code propagation when building inside the VMR #55201
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Fix multiple CSP policies #55200
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Update locker.yml #55188
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Merge feature/openapi to main #55182
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Implement minimal implementation of HybridCache #55147
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Condition RIDs on which target RIDs are available when doing a VMR build #55172
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure OutputCaching generates a documentation file #55170
    area-middleware
  • Ensuring deleted cookies are recognized by the browser by ensuring the MaxAge within CookieOptions is set to null. #55169
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Per-page opt out from interactive routing #55157
    area-blazor
  • update project templates package reference #55155
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump not working when process run as user #4375
  • Error: No CLR runtime found (dump collected with 8.0.0) #4563
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update pe file key generator for net framework #4616

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Button on a CollectionView's EmptyView is not clickable on Windows #21935
  • Action Sheet is displayed behind the popup page #21934
  • HttpClient on Android sends wrong content-type header with ByteArrayContent #21933
  • Can't publish MAUI project for android #21931
  • "Timespan.Days property not found" when production app released to iOS App Store #21930
  • Seeing error The program '...Program Trace' has exited with code 0 (0x0) #21924
  • UIDevice.CurrentDevice.Orientation return Unknown in 8.0.20 works in 8.0.6 #21922
  • Broken MSBuild on Android Build .NET MAUI #21921
  • MaximumWidthRequest should not include Margin #21917
  • Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #21916
  • SwipeView does not honor MaximumHeightRequest in windows #21915
  • Cache Memory keeps increasing when taking photo using "Microsoft.Maui.Media.MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync() " causing app to Crash #21914
  • CollectionView does not adjust the size of a group when items in the group change size in ios and android #21913
  • SwipeItemViews do not work. #21911
  • The "XamlCTask" task failed unexpectedly. #21910
  • Custom entry control in tie iOS app - Ended is not firing unless focus is changed to another entry, seemingly breaking HideSoftInputOnTapped attribute #21905
  • Startup project crashes after splashscreen on iPadOS and .NET8.0 in release mode #21903
  • [WinUI3] Program has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #21901
  • FlexLayout - Layout cycle detected. Layout could not complete. #21898
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering TableViewRenderer on Android #21896
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering RecyclerView.ViewHolder on Android #21895

Closed

  • MAUI webapi call fails FATAL #21893
  • [iOS] CollectionView gets moved when keyboard or picker show up #21630
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Android Platform App Theme does not automatically update when switching themes #21774
    .NET 8 SR4
  • I AM ON .NET 9.0 AND STILL CANT COMPILE A SIMPLE HELLO WORLD IN C# , what kind of trash are you guys selling up there ? why cant we develop .NET apps on C# ? #21929
  • Whole App Shell and Shell content disapear when changing between tabs fast enough (Release mode on Android) #18555
  • Packaged Windows App Missing Permissions after installed? #21626
  • Widespread memory leak propagation in visual trees #21809
    Backlog
  • CollectionView is not currently being Garbage Collected #20710
    .NET 8 SR4
  • MAUI 7.0.58 does not yet include this fix, however the upcoming 7.0.59 release will include it. #21899
  • Hello lovely human, thank you for your comment on this issue. Because this issue has been closed for a period of time, please strongly consider opening a new issue linking to this issue instead to ensure better visibility of your comment. Thank you! #21900
  • Privacy updates for App Store submissions #21907
  • Duplicate symbol build error #21483

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Merge SR4 to main #21936
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨

  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Core on Tizen #21925
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard

Merged

  • 8.0.21 Release Branding #21937
  • [iOS] Fix KeyboardScrolling for controls inside the NavBar #21806

  • Update locker.yml #21894
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix crash closing Popup with WebView #21923
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [C] Propagate resources when reparenting #21879
  • [cake] add `SourceGen.UnitTests` #21889
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak with CollectionView #21850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦

Updated

  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21733
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in gestures #21887
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve CheckContextConstructors method in EntityFrameworkServiceCollectionExtensions #33572
  • Add ServiceCollection extension method for removing a DbContext or its options #33571
  • Consider adding ExecuteSqlReader/ExecuteSqlRawReader and ExecuteSqlScalar/ExecuteSqlRawScalar APIs #33569
  • Consider adding support for ArraySegment<byte> #33568
  • Option to enable `DECLARE @x AS type = value` style logging of parameter values #33566
  • Working with JSON columns in SQLServer uses strict mode, could result in "SqlException: Property cannot be found on the specified JSON path" exception. #33565
  • Using collection.Contains on nvarchar column with max length could result in partial matches #33564
  • CAST added to every value when doing Contains #33563
  • EF Core Change Tracking Mechanism Fail to update Entity Tracking internal Info on just Added Entity if pk field values change after entity being added to context #33562
  • Optional ValueGeneration for Keys #33560
  • Auto-generate compiled models for all contexts in the given assembly unless a single one is specified #33558

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/2.1] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33567
    tell-mode
  • InMemoryTable: Make IsConcurrencyConflict() method more readable #33561
  • Fix to #33547 - Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33559

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Separate public pipeline #33552
    tell-mode
  • Use placeholder value to fix CredScan #33550

Updated

  • Support hierarchical partition keys in Cosmos provider #33536
    breaking-change

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Build fails CI for SDK @ release/6.0.1xx #19525

PullRequests

Created

  • Conditionally publish test results for PR runs #19533
  • Update implicit versions #19532
  • [8.0.1xx] Use correct image name for Arm pool #19531
  • Add SDK Symbols tests #19528
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19524
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19523
  • Update Fedora versions in release/8.0.1xx #19521
  • Enable NuGet Client in the VMR build #19520

Merged

  • Use correct image name for Arm pool #19530
  • Fix path for trx files #19529
  • Update Branding and Implicit Versions 🐍 + ILLink Hotfix #19527
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19512
  • [VMR] Set "runTests: false" for Windows PGO jobs #19516

Updated

  • Enable building "non-official" VMR builds #19491
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #19434
  • Add SBRP DependencyPackageProjects Build Infra #19419
  • Add Join-Verticals task, use it at the final Join Point #19369
